title: Video Games Live^WDead
content:
Due to circumstances beyond our control, Video Games Live will not be playing any of the previously scheduled shows, with the exception of Seattle and Vancouver on October 29 and October 30. Furthermore, plans are being made for additional shows in specific markets across North America for 2006.
Source: Video Games Live | www.videogameslive.com

Bastards. I was looking forward to that concert, too. When the girl and I saw the commercial for it, we looked at each others' dropped jaws and I went off to get the scoop. What's worse is that although we got the price of tickets refunded, Ticketmaster kept my service fee. What wonderful service!
